website_summaries.verdict: What adventurers can get out of the Outmost Ventilator Waterproof is a gear that offers remarkable support and comfort. They can also expect a one-to-one kind of fit from this watertight shoe. A hurdle in the form of a lengthy break-in period needs to be overcome first, however, before wearers can gain access to its excellent capabilities. All in all, the Merrell Outmost Ventilator Waterproof has the potential to be the go-to footwear of many, especially once it is completely broken in.
pros: The Outmost Ventilator Waterproof’s true-to-size fit impressed a large crowd of reviewers
A great multitude of wearers found this Merrell footgear enthrallingly comfortable
Its highly reliable arch support was praised by numerous owners
Some users were able to stay completely dry in this dependably waterproof hiking shoe
Several testers commended the Outmost Ventilator Waterproof’s ultra-sticky outsole
This hiker, thanks to its supreme lightness, received applause from a handful of consumers
A few Merrell loyalists swore by the outstanding breathability of this footgear
cons: Its long break-in period didn’t sit well with a couple of wearers
A patron was not pleased with the footwear’s narrow toe box

customer_reviews.title: Sweaty feet beware, great shoe otherwise!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I feel great after standing all day! If I had any complaint is that They aren’t very breathable, which is understandable for a waterproof boot. The line is Goretex, but it still retains moisture so my stocks are a bit damp at the end of the day. Very comfortable and waterproof though, so not a big deal. I had the same shoe without the Goretex lining and they were good until you stepped in a puddle. I’m very happy all-in-all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solved my foot pain
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing merrell boots well over 2 yrs now. By suggestion by a coworker. I had terrible foot pain. These boots solved all my pain. I continue to purchase and wear these boots. I wear them at work on concrete all day long. Then I have a pair I wear outside of work. Great fit, great comfort. Highly recommend merrell
customer_reviews.author: Adam Large

customer_reviews.title: not slip resistant
customer_reviews.text: This is the only pair of Merrell shoes I've ever had that doesn't grip on smooth wet surfaces. It's like ice skating on wet tile,dangerous really.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for low or fallen arches , gives the support !!
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is a true fit , good support . Great room around toe area . Good if on feet very long .
customer_reviews.author: Ddmz

customer_reviews.title: Very slippery on wet pavement
customer_reviews.text: Very slippery soles when wet. Walking on wet pavement is like walking on ice. I've fallen several times on sloped sidewalks. When it's wet out I have to be very conscious of how I move in these shoes. I can almost skate in them, almost. They're great shoes otherwise. I've had them four months and there's no visible wear at all. I wear them every weekday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like was Amazon insisting I answer ALL the questions before I end this post. Shoes Good. Amazon review homework - bad.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy em !
customer_reviews.text: Its Merrell . What else needs to be said ?
customer_reviews.author: Zanadoodoo

customer_reviews.title: I love the way they fit and feel
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great fit and very comfortable and water resistant. This my 3rd pair first in this color witch is not my favorite colors but if they last as long as the other 2 pair I will be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kubec

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. My last ones lasted 15 years, hope I can get the same wear out of these. They are a little smaller than I expected, but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet P

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Husband always wants me to reorder. He uses as work shoes. He gets a year out of them. But his year is like my 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa_S

customer_reviews.title: good quality but not very wide
customer_reviews.text: Okay, good quality but not very wide... You need wider shoes for hiking I think
customer_reviews.author: ILoveFootball

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Wore them to work straight out of the box, no blisters or break-in period
customer_reviews.author: Jason Archie

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was too heavy; it was too thick. Too small for a 12.
customer_reviews.author: David Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe good fit
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but a very good shoe and perfect fit. I wear a 10.5, ordered a 10.5 and it's spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Laketime

customer_reviews.title: Monster Hikers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are already me new favorites! I had Merrell shoes, but they grew tight since my feet are still growing for some reason; I'm 43. 11.5 are great, and the tread on these dang ol' damn things are so aggressive my girlfriend got scared.
customer_reviews.author: Scotta Blanchat

product_meta.title: Merrell mens J42459 Outmost Vent Waterproof
product_meta.description: Don't let a little rain spoil the hike. The Outmost Vent Waterproof light hiking shoe. Waterproof suede and textile mesh uppers. M Select™ DRY impermeable membrane seals out water and lets moisture escape. Full lace-up closure. Bellows tongue. Breathable mesh interior. M Select™ FIT.ECO+ blended EVA footbed features organic odor control. Nylon arch shank. Air cushioning in the heel. M Select™ GRIP traction outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 15 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Lace up closure for a secure fit
Breathable fabric linings with organic odor control
Merrell M Select FIT ECO contoured footbed for added comfort
Merrell Air Cushioned heel for added shock absorption and stability
